With a delicious tangy floral taste, our vegan Rose Yummies will utterly delight your senses. Many of our customers consider Rose Yummies to be the best tasting gummies they’ve ever had.

Active ingredients:

Organic Bulgarian Rose oil. Rose Nectar. Vittamin C.

Other ingredients:

Tapioca Syrup, Cane Sugar, Water, Agar, Locust Bean Gum, Natural Flavor, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Vegetable Juice For Color, Coconut Oil, Carnauba Wax.

Each yummy contains ~ 1g sugar.

Active ingredients:

Organic Bulgarian Rose oil. Rose Nectar. Vittamin C.

Other ingredients:

Water, Agar, Locust Bean Gum, Natural Flavor, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Vegetable Juice For Color, Coconut Oil, Carnauba Wax, Xylitol, Sorbitol.
For best results, take 2 or more rose yummies daily

In the 80s, the leader of then-communist Bulgaria was aware of the health benefits of the Bulgarian Rose. Growing up, he watched his parents take every morning a sugar cube with 2-3 drops of rose oil to boost brain health and prevent mental decline. He tasked top Bulgarian scientists to develop an ingestible rose oil product. Skeptical at first, the scientists soon discovered that the oil delivered on its great promise - it not only stimulated brain health, but also boosted heart cardiovascular health and showed potent anti-aging effects. They called it “the fountain of youth”. Shortly after, Bulgaria launched a patented product with incredible results, and became a major export to wealthier nations. Yet, little did they know about vibrations at the time. That product and the scientific research behind it inspired us to create Rose Yummies. After two years of research and development, we are thrilled to introduce to you the only Rose Gummies in the world! Not just healthier, but also tastier than any gummy out there.

settings.featured_review_text: I ordered and then I turned and ordered again, the gummies are so good. As soon as you swallow you feel this burst of energy.

settings.text:
These are delicious! I’m so glad I discovered them. They really do have a calming effect! I have one in the morning and another before bed. It’s hard not to eat half the container in one sitting though.

- Sarah B.

settings.product_testimonials_text: If you want your children to enjoy the healthiest treat around, look no further! With every bite, you can feel you are doing something great for yourself. What an amazing product for my whole family!
